main event: A UFO was sighted in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania on 18 August 1956 and observed for 2-3 minutes with a pendulum swinging motion at 10,000 feet altitude.
interesting points: The object was observed visually for 1 hr 45 minutes, indicating a prolonged sighting.
The report suggests different possible explanations for the observed object: balloon, meteor, or possibly aircraft.
Although there were no photographs, the observation was categorized as a 2-Ground-Visual type.
The location of the sighting, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, is notable due to its urban nature.
The object's course was described as 'Condudum', which adds to the mystery of the sighting.
result: possible explanations include balloon, meteor, or possibly aircraft
sighted object: a UFO with pendulum swinging motion at 10,000 feet altitude
